participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is energetic and creative, always looking for new music to explore and video games to conquer. She has a passion for fashion and enjoys expressing herself through her unique style.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous and loves the thrill of speed. He enjoys the freedom that comes with riding his motorbike and has a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. my main transportation is my motorbike. i have light skin with big brown eyes. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

content.text: Hey, listen. I like to listen to music and play video games
What do you think about ConvAI competition?
